title: Bug 6410 - File dirtied by code assist without actual changes
description: Bug 6410 - File unchanged but dirtied by code assist
OB: When using code assist, the file is marked as dirtied even though there are no actual changes made. Additionally, the code assist feature does not appear.
EB: The file should not be marked as dirtied and code assist should appear without any issues.
SR:
1. Open the file in the IDE.
2. Trigger the code assist feature.
3. Check if the file is marked as dirtied even though no changes were made.
4. Verify if the code assist feature is not appearing as expected.
